member.name: T:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker
member.summary: Provides a FloatMenuOption with a simple color picker. Only Supports up to 5 colors.

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker.#ctor(System.Action{UnityEngine.Color},Verse.MenuOptionPriority,UnityEngine.Color[])
member.summary:
Creates a simple color picker with a maximum of 5 colors. The selected color is passed to the action.
If colors is null, it will display the default colors: White, Red, Green, Blue, Yellow

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker.Chosen(UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Called when a user makes a selection. Invokes the action passed to this FloatMenuOption

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker.DoGUI(UnityEngine.Rect,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called every OnGUI. Draws the FloatMenu contents.
